searchBook.requestInfo:
@js:

	return {'url': config.host+"/search/?keywords="+encodeURI(params.keyWord), 'httpHeaders':{'User-Agent':'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/94.0.4606.61 Safari/537.36'}};

bookDetail.requestInfo:
@js:

	return {'url': params.queryInfo.detailUrl, 'httpHeaders':{'User-Agent':'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/94.0.4606.61 Safari/537.36'}};
